content.question: The images show two views of the Vietnam Veterans Memorial, Washington, D.C., U.S., designed by Maya Lin in 1982 C.E. Describe at least one visual characteristic of the Vietnam Memorial. Describe the specific physical placement of the Vietnam Memorial. Using two examples of visual and/or contextual evidence, explain how Maya Lin’s design of the memorial relates to her ideas about the effect of the Vietnam War on the American people. Using specific contextual evidence, explain how the memorial was controversial at the time it was created.

frqParts.text: The images show two views of the Vietnam Veterans Memorial, Washington, D.C., U.S., designed by Maya Lin in 1982 C.E. topic.text: 10.2: Purpose and Audience in Global Contemporary Art

skill.text: Skill 1.B: Describe visual elements of a work of art (or group of related works of art), including-  a. form.  b. style.  c. materials.  d. technique.  e. content.
